meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the city of Nice in France.
meanings.sent1: The nicoise architecture of the building reminded me of the colorful houses in Nice.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the nicoise essence of the French town in his painting.
meanings.sent3: The nicoise flair of her outfit made her stand out at the party.
meanings.sent4: His speech had a nicoise charm that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The nicoise sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: A salad typically made with tuna, tomatoes, hard-boiled eggs, olives, and anchovies.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious nicoise salad for lunch at the cafe.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty was a fresh nicoise salad with a tangy dressing.
meanings.sent3: She packed a nicoise salad for a picnic, but forgot the fork!
meanings.sent4: The flavors in the nicoise salad danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The colorful nicoise salad looked like a work of art on the plate.
